channel.title: ClientScript2 Debugger/IDE project
channel.description:
This program is only able to disassemble and do simple debugging atm but it does provide great insight into the new clients, at the moment i am using an older client for testing (rev 649) but when its done i will add the debugging server to the current client as of then
I will also integrate this with mgi's compiler athough thats only useful for RSPS
http://code.google.com/p/clientscript-research/source/browse/debuggeride
Progress: - Basic debugging (Breakpoints, Break on opcode, Break on error) - Stack inspector - Variable watch - Smart tooltips - Better disassembler
Debugger CLI log: [CODE]ClientScript2 Console Debugger Author: Peter Bosch Connected to client at 127.0.0.1:43600 >opbreak 5615 >state SCR:function2945 PC:149 ISC:0 SSC:2 LSC:0 CSC:2 >xinfo IVC:6 SVC:2 LVC:0 >glocal string 1 localString1 = pass >glocal string 0 localString0 = user >gstack string 2 S:pass S:user >view >[/CODE]
Screeny: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/w7k6ix.png[/img]

item.title: ClientScript2 Debugger/IDE project
item.dc:creator: @peterbjornx peterbjornx
item.description:
@peterbjornx wrote:

This program is only able to disassemble and do simple debugging atm but it does provide great insight into the new clients,
at the moment i am using an older client for testing (rev 649) but when its done i will add the debugging server to the current client as of then

I will also integrate this with mgi’s compiler athough thats only useful for RSPS

http://code.google.com/p/clientscript-research/source/browse/debuggeride

Progress:

  • Basic debugging (Breakpoints, Break on opcode, Break on error)
  • Stack inspector
  • Variable watch
  • Smart tooltips
  • Better disassembler

Debugger CLI log:

[CODE]ClientScript2 Console Debugger
Author: Peter Bosch
Connected to client at 127.0.0.1:43600

opbreak 5615
state
SCR:function2945 PC:149 ISC:0 SSC:2 LSC:0 CSC:2
xinfo
IVC:6 SVC:2 LVC:0
glocal string 1
localString1 = pass
glocal string 0
localString0 = user
gstack string 2
S:pass
S:user
view
[/CODE]

Screeny:

w7k6ix.png439×503
